name: Its Just 100
description:
ITS JUST 100!

is not that hard, right?

Reach 100 points before its too fast!

its just 100 is a simple/minimalistic game intended to be difficult but fun at the same time. it doesn't have the best quality neither the best sound production, but it gets the job done when we talk about killing time.

I hope that you like my first game, and that also you enjoy it!
